name: trending_music_gaming_news_movies
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cheap_youtube_api.
Tool description: 100% Uptime & Reliable | Blazing fast | Fully Featured | 1000x cheaper than Youtube API v3
API description: Get trending videos.

Optional parameters:
type: "music", "gaming", "news", "movies"
region: ISO 3166 country code (default: "US")

type.description: The category of videos to fetch. Options include "music", "gaming", "news", and "movies". Defaults to 'gaming'.

region.description: The ISO 3166 country code specifying the region. Defaults to 'US'.
